channel.title: It's Elisa
channel.description: A personal blog following the travels and life of Elisa

item.title: Ballooning in Cappadocia
item.description:
Once a year, go someplace you've never been before.

First sunrise in Cappadociaâ€¦taken from the sky in a balloon. What a breathtaking way to start a trip!

item.title: Mama Oia!
item.description: Pretty little homes decorate the streets of Oia. Even though it would be thunderstorming just a couple minutes after this shot, I wandered in joy basking in the beauty of the streets.
